title: Trynna figure out what I said wrong to be banned 2 weeks
body:
(changed board)
Game 1
le un le seul: tf u want
le un le seul: GO IN *as zilean, i e'd someone so they could go in*
le un le seul: heal me kog *i was low*
le un le seul: se
le un le seul: see
le un le seul: worth
le un le seul: stop pinging me *my premades and i ping ourselves constantly, everytime it's up*
le un le seul: heal my
le un le seul: MY DICK
le un le seul: sausaged
le un le seul: stfu weeb
le un le seul: stfu aaron
le un le seul: ur w
le un le seul: fuck%%%% *you can see most of my insults don't make any sense*
le un le seul: kys
le un le seul: it has like 0,000001 sec cd *directed at soraka*
le un le seul: welp i cant ping for a minute now
le un le seul: g i t g u d
le un le seul: wait
le un le seul: ill ult you
le un le seul: then kys *i was zilean*
le un le seul: WITH YOUR W
le un le seul: you dont deserve to die
le un le seul: shuput
le un le seul: u dont deserve to die
le un le seul: anal beads
le un le seul: kek
le un le seul: wow anaI is censored
le un le seul: kys
le un le seul: NP
le un le seul: fk u
le un le seul: i come in peace
le un le seul: shup the popup
le un le seul: gg

*every insult was directed at people I personally know, and you can see most make no sense
Anyway, I'll go to my smurf for those 2 weeks.
I'm kinda sad because I'm just trying to have fun. Anything I say isn't personally directed and sincere, unless in the cases of gitgud, ggez. It was an aram, I'm the kind of guy that trolls all game long (and still winning).

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=le un le seul,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ZrIEPEsF,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-15T02:09:24.539+0000)every insult was directed at people I personally know, and you can see most make no sense

This doesn't matter at ALL, unless the ENTIRE team is your premade group. Use whispers if you want to insult your friends in "humorous" fashions -- doing it in-game WILL get you punished if others are exposed to it.

That said, let's look at the logs.

> le un le seul: MY DICK
> le un le seul: anal beads

Unnecessary sexual comments aren't good. I'd recommend avoiding them.

> le un le seul: stfu weeb
> le un le seul: stfu aaron
> le un le seul: g i t g u d
> le un le seul: fk u
> le un le seul: shup the popup

This is all rude and/or insulting.

> le un le seul: kys
> le un le seul: then kys
> le un le seul: kys

This is something Riot punishes very aggressively. It doesn't matter if you're Zilean -- use another phrasing. Even "Zil ult. Die" is better.

> le un le seul: fuck%%%%

The part that is censored is 100% not acceptable, and Riot has a zero-tolerance policy for it.

------------------------

In general, you need to remember there are other people in the game. It doesn't matter if you and your friend find this stuff 100% acceptable and 100% hilarious -- if you're exposing other players to it, you can be punished for it. Full stop.

-------------------------

If it WAS a 5-man pre-made, be aware that (I believe) reports check the ENTIRE log. So proceed with caution -- if an enemy reports you and your log contains this sort of language, you can still be hit with a ban.
I'm still not convinced that it's someone from a 5 man party, people who i've played like 30-40 arams with? reported me. Anyway, I was pretty sure this would happen, may this serve as a lesson

> [{quoted}](name=le un le seul,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ZrIEPEsF,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-05-15T02:20:24.742+0000)Anyway, I was pretty sure this would happen, may this serve as a lesson

Definitely the right takeaway. Be warned though -- after a 14-day ban, your account is on VERY thin ice, as the next punishment is the permanent one. Tread carefully, double-check everything before you hit enter, and, when in doubt, delete it without sending it.

Good luck on the Rift!
Thanks. I'm not sure how I'll do this because I love talking with mates (maybe too much though :/)
Use discord. Riot can't track discord.

> [{quoted}](name=le un le seul,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ZrIEPEsF,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2017-05-15T02:24:03.180+0000)
>
> Thanks. I'm not sure how I'll do this because I love talking with mates (maybe too much though :/)

I'd recommend Skype or Discord. Both are free, easy to set up, and light weight enough to run behind pretty much any other program, including *League*.

Otherwise? Save that sort of chat for out of game, or use the /w function (although that only lets you talk to one person at a time).

>le un le seul: kys

Shoulda been a perma.
Agreed. Why spew all that nonsense when there are other players?

le un le seul: heal my
le un le seul: MY DICK

le un le seul: stfu weeb
le un le seul: stfu aaron

le un le seul: fuck%%%% you can see most of my insults don't make any sense
le un le seul: kys

le un le seul: then kys i was zilean

le un le seul: anal beads
le un le seul: kek
le un le seul: wow anaI is censored
le un le seul: kys
le un le seul: NP
le un le seul: fk u
le un le seul: i come in peace
le un le seul: shup the popup

fk you and kys are like bad bad words ok
go wash your mouth with soap
also no skins for 2 weeks

I'm not sure (the logs are only from one game) but it's someone in the enemy team who reported me. He was mad crazy because we were focusing him the whole time.

Also, everything was not intended to be sincere (it was a 5 man premade anyway)

It's weird there's no further explanation on how I got banned, just a chat log.

Did you say anything in all chat? If not you might make a support ticket asking if they can overturn it because nobody that saw what you were typing reported you. If someone on your premade team troll reported you there probably isn't much they will be willing to do. They might not be willing to help you anyway. Worth a shot though.
I think I said gitgud to the guy that was mad crazy, and GG at the end. Good idea, I'll try. Thanks

>le un le seul: kys

There you go.

Well serves you right for saying all that flame. Everything you say in chat CAN and WILL be in your liability. Doesn't matter if you know the players. Other players in that game are captive audience the moment the chat is revealed to them. So....I'd say 2 weeks ban is justified.
Well, whatever. I guess I won't restart -.- at least for 2 weeks ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
